sentences.english: Rock climbers descend the spire of Tricouni Nail in the Needles of South Dakota Black Hills.
sentences.chinese: 南达科他州黑岗石林里，攀岩者从三齿钉山尖下滑。

sentences.english: Nail in the Needles of South Dakota Black Hills.
sentences.chinese: 南达科他州黑岗石林里，攀岩者从三齿钉山尖下滑。

sentences.english: Kunming, Stone Forest, National Museum, Yunnan Folkways Village.
sentences.chinese: 游览石林，参观民族博物馆，民族村等。

sentences.english: To Shilin pointed out that management is an eternal theme.
sentences.chinese: 至石林指出，管理是一个永恒的主题。

sentences.english: Treasure Tripod Temple is among stones of different weird shapes, known as a Little Stone Forest.
sentences.chinese: 宝鼎寺周围尽是千姿百态的石头，俗称小石林。

sentences.english: The world-famous Stone Forest lies within Lunan County.
sentences.chinese: 举世闻名的石林胜景位于路南县境内。

sentences.english: Is in the world one of grand mountain hoodoos .
sentences.chinese: 是世界上壮丽的高山石林之一。

sentences.english: The Jingdong Grand Canyon and the hoodoo canyon are Pinggu County's natural scenic spots.
sentences.chinese: 京东大峡谷与石林峡都是平谷县的自然风景区。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the burden of disease (BOD) in Shilin County.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究石林县的疾病负担。

sentences.english: Stone Forest is a famous national scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 石林是全国著名的风景名胜。

sentences.english: I know, let's fly to Kunming to see the spectacular stone forest there.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，让我们乘飞机去昆明看看那儿壮观的石林。

sentences.english: The Shilin (Chinese for stone forest) is an impressive example of karst topography.
sentences.chinese: 石林是岩溶地形的佼佼者。

sentences.english: Stone forest is a kind of tall clints in geomorphologic structure.
sentences.chinese: 石林在地貌上是一种高大的石芽。

sentences.english: Before that, I was always grinding in Thousands Needles.
sentences.chinese: 之前，我常常在千针石林练级。

sentences.english: But the hoodoo pressure is also to him as does not have any effect.
sentences.chinese: 而石林的威压似乎对他没有任何作用。

sentences.english: Fifth day we went to Shangri-La and visited Pudacuo National Park. The last day we visited Stone Forest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一天，我们抵达石林，坐飞机回到了温暖的家。
